►►► This video ◄◄◄  

This week Samsung management declared emergency mode and 6 day work weeks, AltStore PAL, the first official App Store alternative launched on iOS, and Boston Dynamics revealed their new Atlas humanoid robot.

Episode 194

Kilian's Nothing Ear reviews: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0r15PenQReQ
